ThingDef.label: ancient blast door, closed
ThingDef.description: A heavily-reinforced door made of an ultratech polymer, sealed shut.

ThingDef.label: ancient blast door, frame
ThingDef.description: A heavily-reinforced door frame made of an ultratech polymer.

ThingDef.label: rubble pile
ThingDef.description: The crumbled remains of an ancient structure.

ThingDef.label: ancient excavator
ThingDef.description: The remains of a mining vehicle. The valuable parts were looted long ago.

ThingDef.label: ancient drill rig
ThingDef.description: A device meant for drilling deep into the earth. Any valuable parts were looted long ago.

ThingDef.label: ancient tunneler claw
ThingDef.description: The claw of an ancient mining mechanoid. All the parts are degraded to uselessness.

ThingDef.label: ancient tunneler husk
ThingDef.description: The remains of an ancient mining mechanoid. Its complex parts are all degraded to uselessness.

ThingDef.label: ancient research bench
ThingDef.description: An old, rudimentary research bench with corroded tools and faded notes. Nothing of value remains.

ThingDef.label: ancient brewery
ThingDef.description: A dilapidated brewing table once used for fermentation. The equipment is rusted beyond use.

ThingDef.label: ancient butcher table
ThingDef.description: A broken butcher's table littered with old stains.

ThingDef.label: ancient drug lab
ThingDef.description: A crumbling lab table with shattered glassware. The equipment is useless and contaminated.

ThingDef.label: rusted bed
ThingDef.description: A single bed frame with rusted metal and a torn mattress. It's better than sleeping on the ground, but just barely.

ThingDef.label: rusted double bed
ThingDef.description: A double bed with broken springs and a tattered mattress. It barely offers comfort, but two can sleep here if desperate.

ThingDef.label: ancient ammo box
ThingDef.description: A container of ancient ammunition. It's empty and any remaining rounds are corroded to uselessness.

ThingDef.label: ancient antenna
ThingDef.description: A rusted antenna used to transmit long-forgotten communications.

ThingDef.label: ancient military generator
ThingDef.description: A small rusted generator. The fuel tank is empty and the engine is beyond repair.

ThingDef.label: broken autocannon turret
ThingDef.description: An autocannon turret with a shattered barrel. The targeting system is missing and all the components are rusted and bent to uselessness.

ThingDef.label: broken uranium slug turret
ThingDef.description: A heavy turret designed to fire uranium slugs. The mechanism is smashed and the ammo is depleted.

ThingDef.label: busted mortar
ThingDef.description: A shattered mortar emplacement. It's smashed and will never work again.

ThingDef.label: ancient container
ThingDef.description: A rusted shipping container. It's completely empty.

ThingDef.label: rusted open container
ThingDef.description: A rusted shipping container. Its contents are worthless.

ThingDef.label: ancient crate pallet
ThingDef.description: A pallet for stacking and transporting crates. The contents have been scavenged long ago.

ThingDef.label: old wooden crate
ThingDef.description: A weathered wooden crate. It's empty, and the wood is brittle.

ThingDef.label: ruined crane base
ThingDef.description: The base of a large industrial crane.

ThingDef.label: ruined crane arm
ThingDef.description: A rusted crane arm, twisted and broken.

ThingDef.label: ruined crane arm
ThingDef.description: A smaller chunk of a crane arm, snapped and rusted.

ThingDef.label: ruined crane column
ThingDef.description: A vertical support column from a ruined crane. It's rusted and no longer stable.

ThingDef.label: ruined forklift
ThingDef.description: A broken forklift, rusted and missing parts. It's far too damaged to be repaired.

ThingDef.label: rusted industrial truck
ThingDef.description: An industrial truck, heavily rusted and abandoned. The engine is beyond repair.

ThingDef.label: rusted metal crate
ThingDef.description: A metal crate, now rusted shut. It's empty and worthless.

ThingDef.label: ancient container
ThingDef.description: A rusted shipping container. It's completely empty.

ThingDef.label: old cardboard box
ThingDef.description: An soggy cardboard box filled with old detritus.

ThingDef.label: ancient industrial shelf
ThingDef.description: An industrial shelf covered in rust. It offers nothing of value.

ThingDef.label: ancient shelf
ThingDef.description: An ancient shelf. It holds nothing of interest.

ThingDef.label: ancient small shelf
ThingDef.description: An ancient shelf. There's nothing useful left on it.

ThingDef.label: ancient destroyed console
ThingDef.description: A ruined console. It is now completely inoperable. Its usable parts were smashed or looted long ago.

ThingDef.label: ancient destroyed console
ThingDef.description: A ruined console. It is now completely inoperable. Its usable parts were smashed or looted long ago.

ThingDef.label: medicine pallet
ThingDef.description: A pallet containing fake medical supplies.

ThingDef.label: survival meal pallet
ThingDef.description: A pallet containing fake survival meals.

ThingDef.label: component box
ThingDef.description: A box filled with fake components.

ThingDef.label: advanced component box
ThingDef.description: A box of fake advanced components.

ThingDef.label: steel scrap box
ThingDef.description: A box filled with fake steel scrap. It's heavy.

ThingDef.label: malfunctioning transport pod
ThingDef.description: A cargo pod with a faulty release mechanism. It's still sealed, and empty.

ThingDef.label: chemfuel canister
ThingDef.description: A sealed canister of chemfuel. It is empty.

ThingDef.label: rusted safe
ThingDef.description: A locked safe. It's heavily rusted, and empty.

ThingDef.label: steel scrap pallet
ThingDef.description: A pallet stacked with fake steel scrap.

ThingDef.label: sealed crate
ThingDef.description: A small crate that's still sealed.

ThingDef.label: open crate
ThingDef.description: A small crate.

ThingDef.label: sealed container
ThingDef.description: A small container that's still sealed.

ThingDef.label: open container
ThingDef.description: A small container.

ThingDef.label: mechanoid ship chunk
ThingDef.description: A chunk of mechanoid spacecraft made of steel and gravlite panels. It seems to have been torn off either by uncontrolled re-entry forces or some kind of weapon.

ThingDef.label: grav engine
ThingDef.description: The ultratech heart of a gravship. Generates lift by inverting and intensifying gravity in a field around itself. Upon closer inspection it seems to be made out of cardboard.

ThingDef.label: grav field extender
ThingDef.description: Extends the area in which substructure can be built and increases support capacity. This extender seems completely inert.

ThingDef.label: pilot console
ThingDef.description: An interface that allows launching and piloting a gravship. This console seems completely inert.

ThingDef.label: small chemfuel tank
ThingDef.description: A chemfuel storage tank that supplies fuel for thrusters on a gravship. This tank seems completely inert.

ThingDef.label: large chemfuel tank
ThingDef.description: A massive chemfuel storage tank that supplies fuel for thrusters on a gravship. This tank seems completely inert.

ThingDef.label: small thruster
ThingDef.description: A chemfuel thruster that increases the range of a gravship. This thruster seems completely inert.

ThingDef.label: large thruster
ThingDef.description: An advanced chemfuel thruster that greatly increases the range of a gravship. This thruster seems completely inert.

ThingDef.label: fuel optimizer
ThingDef.description: A gravtech unit that reduces the fuel needed for gravship flight. This unit seems completely inert.

ThingDef.label: signal jammer
ThingDef.description: A signal emitter that disguises the electromagnetic signature of your gravship. This emitter seems completely inert.

ThingDef.label: gravcore power cell
ThingDef.description: A power generator that draws energy from gravitational waves passing through the gravship. This generator seems completely inert.

ThingDef.label: pilot subpersona core
ThingDef.description: A low-grade subpersona specialized in gravship flight. This one only has access to chatGPT and is therefore dumber than a Steam mod commenter.

ThingDef.label: gravship shield generator
ThingDef.description: Creates a short-lived momentum repulsor surface to block projectiles. This generator seems completely inert.

ThingDef.label: grav anchor
ThingDef.description: Prevents the local map from being destroyed during a gravship launch. This anchor seems completely inert.

ThingDef.label: relay stabilizer
ThingDef.description: A shield projecter that protects a nearby mechanoid relay. This one is completely inert.

ThingDef.label: mechanoid relay
ThingDef.description: A node that coordinates signals across a planet-wide mechanoid communication network. This one is completely inert.

ThingDef.label: crashed mechanoid relay
ThingDef.description: A node that coordinates signals across a planet-wide mechanoid communication network. Wrecked.

ThingDef.label: ancient grav reactor
ThingDef.description: An ancient generator powered by a gravcore. Once capable of producing massive amounts of power, it has now fallen into disrepair.

ThingDef.label: ancient grav engine
ThingDef.description: An ultratech engine used to bring large structures and ships into orbit. Nonfunctional for many years.

ThingDef.label: ancient mining charge
ThingDef.description: An explosive device used to quickly blast through rock. It is made from refined chemfuel. The explosive is old and inert.

ThingDef.label: ancient explosives crate
ThingDef.description: A container of ancient mining charges. Inactive.

ThingDef.label: egg sac
ThingDef.description: A slimy sac containing an insect larva. This one is empty.

ThingDef.label: locust cocoon
ThingDef.description: A stasis cocoon containing a locust. This one is empty.

ThingDef.label: ancient transport pod
ThingDef.description: An ancient cargo pod capable of carrying people, animals, and items. Not in working condition.

ThingDef.label: ancient stockpile entrance
ThingDef.description: The entrance to a long-abandoned subterranean facility. Sealed shut.

ThingDef.label: mechanoid drop pod
ThingDef.description: A launchable cargo pod intended to carry mechanoids. Not in working condition.

ThingDef.label: ancient terraformer
ThingDef.description: An ancient terraforming device powered by a gravcore. It is inert.

ThingDef.label: cerebrex core
ThingDef.description: The thinking mind of the mechanoid swarm. Powered by Linux.

ThingDef.label: destroyed cerebrex core
ThingDef.description: The smashed neural nexus of the mechanoid swarm that once commanded mechanoids around the planet.

ThingDef.label: cerebrex stabilizer
ThingDef.description: A remote shield generator that makes the nearby cerebrex core nearly invincible. Or it would, if it wasn't fake.

ThingDef.label: mechanoid processor
ThingDef.description: A powerful mechanoid computer running Windows 98.

ThingDef.label: passenger shuttle
ThingDef.description: A chemfuel-powered shuttle designed for long-distance travel. This one refuses to start.

ThingDef.label: mech pylon
ThingDef.description: A node in a distributed mechanoid computation network.

ThingDef.label: surveying scanner
ThingDef.description: A wideband sensor unit that can detect and map various features in a local area.

ThingDef.label: ancient uplink
ThingDef.description: An ancient transmitter used for secure communications between the surface and orbit.

ThingDef.label: gauss cannon
ThingDef.description: A massive anti-ship cannon that uses electromagnets to launch large metallic darts at extreme velocities. Pew pew.

ThingDef.label: anticraft beam
ThingDef.description: A massive anti-ship beam weapon. Pew pew.

ThingDef.label: mechhive birther
ThingDef.description: An automated mechanoid factory. It periodically births fresh mechanoids.

ThingDef.label: cave entrance
ThingDef.description: The entrance to a cave network. Seems to be just painted on the floor.

ThingDef.label: sulfur spout
ThingDef.description: A naturally-occurring break in the ground from which volcanic gases escape. These vents bring nutrients to the surface from deep underground. Collectively, the fumes they spew are enough to block out the sun.

ThingDef.label: ancient smoke vent
ThingDef.description: The exhaust vent of some long forgotten underground megastructure. Permanently inactive.

ThingDef.label: ancient toxic vent
ThingDef.description: A massive duct that vents toxic fumes from an underground megastructure. Permanently inactive.

ThingDef.label: ancient heat vent
ThingDef.description: A massive duct that drops endlessly into the ground. Permanently inactive.

ThingDef.label: ancient emergency light
ThingDef.description: An ancient light containing a long-lasting battery. Inactive

ThingDef.label: life support unit
ThingDef.description: A unit connected to the orbital platform's larger life support network. It keeps rooms heated and pressurized.

ThingDef.label: orbital scanner
ThingDef.description: A sensor unit that passively scans for irregular objects orbiting the planet. Inactive.

ThingDef.label: oxygen pump
ThingDef.description: A small wall-mounted unit that does nothing.

ThingDef.label: hunter trap
ThingDef.description: A dormant and inactive hunter drone trap.

ThingDef.label: wasp trap
ThingDef.description: Several dormant and inactive wasp drones.

ThingDef.label: ancient machining table
ThingDef.description: A rusted machining table covered in debris. All useful parts have been scavenged.

ThingDef.label: ancient fueled smithy
ThingDef.description: An ancient smithy that once burned fuel for crafting. Now, it's covered in soot and rust.

ThingDef.label: ancient electric smithy
ThingDef.description: A ruined electric smithy with frayed wires and scorched surfaces. It's beyond repair.

ThingDef.label: ancient electric stove
ThingDef.description: An old electric stove with shattered heating elements. It's far too damaged to use.

ThingDef.label: ancient fueled stove
ThingDef.description: A rusted cooking stove. It's beyond unusable.

ThingDef.label: ancient electric tailor bench
ThingDef.description: A ruined tailor's bench with torn fabric and broken tools. It's beyond salvage.

ThingDef.label: ancient hand tailor bench
ThingDef.description: A simple tailor's bench with splintered wood and rusted needles. Nothing useful remains.

ThingDef.label: ancient wind turbine
ThingDef.description: A toppled wind turbine with broken blades. It's been scavenged for parts long ago.

ThingDef.label: large concrete barrier
ThingDef.description: A concrete barrier used to block the path of vehicles.

ThingDef.label: ancient military barrier
ThingDef.description: A concrete barrier once used for military roadblocks.

ThingDef.label: ancient chembarrel
ThingDef.description: A rusted barrel that once stored chemfuel. It's empty and corroded.

ThingDef.label: ancient chembarrel pallet
ThingDef.description: A stack of rusted barrels on a decayed pallet. Any valuable fuel leaked out long ago.

ThingDef.label: ancient chemtruck
ThingDef.description: An abandoned chemfuel transport truck. Any usable parts were looted long ago.

ThingDef.label: ancient armchair
ThingDef.description: A faded and torn armchair. It's unusable in its current state.

ThingDef.label: ancient plant pot
ThingDef.description: A large cracked pot with dead soil. Nothing can grow here any more.

ThingDef.label: busted television
ThingDef.description: A shattered television set. The screen is broken and the electronics are stripped out.

ThingDef.label: cracked bathtub
ThingDef.description: A bathtub with deep cracks and rust stains. It's completely unusable.

ThingDef.label: cracked shower
ThingDef.description: A broken shower stall. The plumbing is corroded and the ceramics are shattered.

ThingDef.label: rusted filing cabinet
ThingDef.description: A corroded filing cabinet. There's nothing useful left inside.

ThingDef.label: ancient cold storage
ThingDef.description: An old refrigeration unit, now rusted shut. Any contents have long since decayed to dust.

ThingDef.label: rusted lockers
ThingDef.description: A set of metal lockers, heavily rusted and bent. They've been thoroughly looted.

ThingDef.label: rusted microwave
ThingDef.description: An ancient microwave covered in rust. It's beyond repair.

ThingDef.label: ancient pipe
ThingDef.description: Steel pipes. These do not transport anything.

ThingDef.label: chipped ice
ThingDef.description: A pile of chipped ice.

ThingDef.label: volcanic ash
ThingDef.description: A pile of volcanic ash.

ThingDef.label: archean tree
ThingDef.description: A tree imitating those bioengineered to terraform deadworlds and early-stage rimworlds. This is a non-functional fake.

ThingDef.label: reeds
ThingDef.description: A fake tall slender plant that grows in water.

ThingDef.label: lily pad
ThingDef.description: A fake water plant with a broad floating leaf.

ThingDef.label: bulrush
ThingDef.description: A fake plant commonly found in swamps, recognizable for its brown cigar-shaped top.

ThingDef.label: lotus
ThingDef.description: A fake aquatic plant known for its fragrant flowers.

ThingDef.label: thornvine
ThingDef.description: A fake prickly vine adapted to living in harsh conditions.\n\nThis object is inert and serves no biological function.

ThingDef.label: snagroot tree
ThingDef.description: A fake gnarled slow-growing tree, adapted to live in toxic scarlands.\n\nThis object is inert and serves no biological function.

ThingDef.label: magma cactus
ThingDef.description: A fake resilient species of cactus notable for its ability to survive extreme heat.\n\nThis object is inert and serves no biological function.

ThingDef.label: night grass
ThingDef.description: A fake grass-like fungus that grows as part of a massive mycelium network.\n\nThis object is inert and serves no biological function.

ThingDef.label: boomshroom
ThingDef.description:
These mushrooms produce volatile chemicals as a defensive measure. They can be harvested for chemfuel. However, this must be done with extreme caution, as the mushrooms can explode if they're destroyed.

Glitterworld researchers have used genetic material from boomshrooms to bioengineer a number of chemfuel-producing animals.

This object is inert and serves no biological function.

ThingDef.label: psilocap
ThingDef.description: A fungus that gives off hallucinogenic spores. Standing next to them is enough to produce mild hallucinations. Psilocaps can be harvested and ingested to produce a vivid sensory experience that increases the user's mood.\n\nThis object is inert and serves no biological function.

ThingDef.label: willowgill
ThingDef.description: A tall spindly slow-growing mushroom with gills that droop like a willow tree. It gives off a soft light.\n\nThis object is inert and serves no biological function.

ThingDef.label: night rafflesia
ThingDef.description: A distant cousin of the giant rafflesia, this plant has adapted to thrive in dark locations. Its beauty is tempered by a strong stench of musk and rotten eggs.\n\nThis object is inert and serves no biological function.

ThingDef.label: yellow grass
ThingDef.description: Wild grass. Grows anywhere there is a little light and minimally fertile ground.\n\nThis object is inert and serves no biological function.

ThingDef.label: tall yellow grass
ThingDef.description: Wild tall grass that grows in tough thickets. It slows down anyone moving over it.\n\nThis object is inert and serves no biological function.

ThingDef.label: fireweed
ThingDef.description: A low-lying plant that produces clusters of purple flowers. It is common in alpine environments.\n\nThis object is inert and serves no biological function.
